original_text: The Ammonite army came to Gilead and they made their camp there. The Israelite army also came and they made their camp in Mizpah.
korean_text: 그 때에 암몬 자손이 모여서 길르앗에 진을 쳤으므로 이스라엘 자손도 모여서 미스바에 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: The Ammonite army came to Gilead
and they made their camp there
and they made their camp in Mizpah
